dct_alternative_sm: Terra Sancta sive Palaestina exhibens non solum regna vetera Juda et Israel in suas XII. tribus distincta sed etiam eorundem diversarum aetatum conditionem et facta in Sacris Paginis indicata
dct_description_sm: mappa geographica noviter adornata opera et studio Tobiae Conradi Lotter ; Matth. Albrecht Lotter, sculps.
Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
2 bar scales on map given in "Milliaria germanica communia" and "Milliaria gallica".
Shows topography, drainage, settlement boundaries of the tribes of Israel, places of historical interest.
Features a compass rose and a decorative cartouche with illustrations of Israelites and the commandments.
Inset map: Israelitarum ex Aegypto in promissam terram Canaan peregrinatio...
